backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining configs, user profiles, shop items, carts, purchases, and access-controlled profile APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping implemented UI features to files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables and dark mode theme tokens for the site.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with router setup, lazy-loaded pages, query client config, and dynamic title handling.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutModal.ts: Modal handling checkout flow, UPI QR generation, user info input, and payment completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/Community.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no content.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a styled footer with branding, a link to caffeine.ai, and a note about secure UPI payments.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main site header with navigation, cart display, login/logout handling, and responsive mobile menu logic.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with header, footer, natural scrolling, routing outlet, and conditionally shows the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal form for creating a user profile, validating input and saving via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, logout, state management, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useNaturalScroll.ts: Implements custom natural scrolling behavior for mouse and touch, skipping designated scrollable elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin checks, user profile CRUD, shop item operations, cart, and configuration data using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers, custom CSS variables, global styles, and utility classes for animations and UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Empty placeholder page for the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/DiscordPage.tsx: Displays a Discord invite page that fetches config data and shows a join button with loading state.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows a user's purchase history with formatted dates, status badges, and item details using queried data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, server status, and voting info, using config data and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a message and button linking back to home.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shop interface supporting filtering, cart management, item listing, and UPI checkout flow.
frontend/src/pages/VotePage.tsx: Vote page listing server voting links based on config with loading and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store and retrieve them from sessionStorage, and persist or clear them across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, plus plugins for animations, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including redesign requirements, feature descriptions, image needs, and current versioning for the website overhaul.
